oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Parking Garage Site at 4th and Charlotte, City Beautiful Scrapbooks, 1958, Vol. 2 p107
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Photograph of a site for a new parking garage at 4th Avenue North and Charlotte Avenue, May 1958. Lowenstein's Department Store in the background. Taken by the City Beautiful Commission of Nashville, Tennessee, 1958. The City Beautiful Commission was established by the Mayor and City Council in June of 1953, for the purpose of improving the sanitation, cleanliness, and overall appearance of the City of Nashville. The Commission later became a division of Metro Parks in 1975, and then a part of the Metro Public Works division in 2005. Forms part of the City Beautiful Commission Scrapbook Collection. 1 photograph : b & w.
